Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item offers unparalleled quality and functionality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth considering at a special introductory price of $15000. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
